title: Ambisonic Crowds  AmbiX  + Stereo
description: Ambisonic Surround Crowds features 60 HD Surround Sound Effects with a large selection of crowds from Conventions, Museums, Markets, Playgrounds, Parks, Carnivals, Casinos and Restaurants.
longDescription:
From 24/96 Sound Effects. Ambisonic Surround Crowds features 60 HD Surround Sound Effects with a large selection of crowds from Conventions, Museums, Markets, Playgrounds, Parks, Carnivals, Casinos and Restaurants. Both Exterior and Interior. From Hollywood Sound Designer Lenny Jones.


Recorded with a Brahma Ambisonic Microphone and a Zoom F8 recorder and downloads in 2 configurations: .WAV Ambisonic B format (AmbiX FOA SN3D with ACN ordering 44.1 kHz, 16bit ), and .WAV Stereo (L-R) All tracks are 1 minute long and are edited to loop seamlessly. All new, original recordings. Drag and drop to add 3D immersive sound to any project. 


Want to try it on your own system before buying? Download the B Format AmbiX .wav


Demo file here: http://2496sfx.com/2496sfx_AmbisonicCrowds1_DEMO_Bformat_AmbiX.wav.zip and plug it into your project.


Need custom Ambisonic tracks for your project? Drop us a line! http://2496sfx.com
technicalDetails:
Features: 60 AmbiX FOA SN3D with ACN ordering 44.1 kHz, 16bit + 60 Stereo Versions

Number of Audio Waves: 120

Number of Audio Cues: 120

Sample Rate/Bit Rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit AmbiX and Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX Loop: No

Minutes of Audio Provided: 120 min

Supported Development Platforms: Audio files are compatible with any platform

Supported Target Build Platforms: Audio files are compatible with any target build platforms
